description: The number of charge/discharge cycles the battery has experienced
The battery's current fully charged capacity in mWh
The percentage of maximum battery capacity relative to when it was new
The theoretical capacity of the battery when new in mWh
The current percentage of battery charge
The current battery voltage across the battery terminals in millivolts
The current rate of battery charge or discharge in milliwatts
The current state of the battery. Reports 1 if the battery has a valid state and 0 if no state is available
